about_the_game:
Bog-Standard Solutions was once a pioneering enterprise, setting the standard for effective bureaucracy across the industry. Now, however, quotas are being missed, phone lines are being cut and someone's living in the bins. Something in this company needs to change.

You have been given a special mission by the Head Honcho: to uncover the mysteries of your workplace and air out your colleagues dirty secrets.

Listen to office gossip, stalk your colleagues and search through their desks when unoccupied. These people aren't careful with their naughty habits, and, let's be honest, you're no better. it's no wonder Bog-Standard Solutions is going down the pan.

Whistleblow on the entire workforce and become the biggest brown noser of Bog-Standard Solutions today!

Features

  • Monday to Friday running schedule

  • 3000+ Lines of dialogue

  • An absurd narrative with strange office dynamics

  • 10 Office workers of questionable character

  • 11 Rooms to explore 

  • 30 Pieces of evidence to uncover

  • Interactive surroundings

  • Mysteries in every room

  • Several challenging puzzles

content_descriptors.notes: Some characters make sexual references in a comical way. There is also one instance of pixel art nudity intended for comical purposes and occasional uses of pixel art blood. Any instances of blood are entirely unrealistic.

short_description: Workplace efficiency is at an all time low at Bog-Standard Solutions. You've been hired to sniff out inefficiencies and get rid of the rabble. Trouble is, everyone's up to something. Collect evidence, listen to gossip and tattle on your colleagues.
